channel.title: CVE Feed for Oracle Corporation -- PeopleSoft Enterprise SCM Strategic Sourcing
channel.description: The latest CVEs for Oracle Corporation -- PeopleSoft Enterprise SCM Strategic Sourcing

item.title: CVE-2017-10287|2024-10-04T16:55:01.904Z -- oracle%20corporation -- peoplesoft%20enterprise%20scm%20strategic%20sourcing
item.description: Vulnerability in the PeopleSoft Enterprise FSCM component of Oracle PeopleSoft Products (subcomponent: Strategic Sourcing). The supported version that is affected is 9.2. Easily exploitable vulnerability allows low privileged attacker with network access via HTTP to compromise PeopleSoft Enterprise FSCM. Successful attacks of this vulnerability can result in unauthorized read access to a subset of PeopleSoft Enterprise FSCM accessible data. CVSS 3.0 Base Score 4.3 (Confidentiality impacts). CVSS Vector: (CVSS:3.0/AV:N/AC:L/PR:L/UI:N/S:U/C:L/I:N/A:N).
